skills.name: Cluster Missile
skills.description: Launches homing missiles at multiple targets. Slightly decreases DMG when hitting the same target multiple times.1st Sequence: 2 missiles.2nd Sequence: 5 missiles.3rd Sequence: 11 missiles.

skills.name: Speedy Clockwork
skills.description: [SP: 12][CD: 20s] Empowers the weapon, accelerating Attack Speed by 75% for 4.s.
